ModMetaData.name: RMC008.VGP额外的花卉与树木
ModMetaData.author: dismarzero
ModMetaData.description:
Xtra Trees and Flowers (Does not require Vegetable Garden) 额外的额外的花卉与树木（不需要VGP菜园子）
Adds EVEN MORE flowers and trees! From the Xtra Plants mod from Igabod long ago! Art work from the great Spoonshortage. 添加了更多的花卉与树木！
Adds New Flowers: -allium giganteum -anthurium -NymphHair -PinkRimstalk -Plumeria -Sunflower
添加的花卉： -大花葱 -花烛 -仙女丝 -粉缘杆 -鸡蛋花 -向日葵
Adds new Trees: -japanese maple -cherry blossom -camellia -acacia
添加的树木： -日本枫树 -樱花树 -山茶树 -金合欢树 -红枫树
